column1: Art Institute of Chicago////This was also my first time checking out the gorgeous Modern Art Wing. Even if I don't really get modern art
column2: it sure is interesting. The space is this wing is well lit by natural light and huge and open. You'll find works by Picasso
column4: and Pollack here. After looking around
column5: make sure you head to the top floor where there is a great restaurant and outdoor sculpture exhibit. Here you will also find a bridge that you can take to the park and there are fantastic views of the city.
